title: Exporting multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Provide a name for the zip file (such as test.zip)
4. Click on the 'Export' button

Observed Behavior:
An error message box pops up with the following details:
- The error message states that problems were encountered during the export
- The error message specifically mentions that the file of the same name in project2 is causing the issue

Expected Behavior:
The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the selected files from different directories, even if some files have the same name.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Provide a name for the zip file (such as test.zip)
4. Click on the 'Export' button
